name: Hound
desc: Lightning fast code searching made easy

options.name: group
options.desc: Group the hound daemon should execute under.

options.name: home
options.desc: The path to use as hound’s $HOME. If the default user “hound” is configured then this is the home of the “hound” user.

options.name: settings
options.desc: The full configuration of the Hound daemon. See the upstream documentation https://github.com/hound-search/hound/blob/main/docs/config-options.md for details.  The dbpath should be an absolute path to a writable directory.

options.name: user
options.desc: User the hound daemon should execute under.
